timeline.bodyText: I wasn't really expecting both PebbleContainer and CAContainer to extend CAContainer. My expectation was that the There would be a new class that would wrap both the PebbleContainer and ChalltestsrvContainer that would extend the CAContainer. This class would then call through appropriately.
